description: Discover the best hotels in Huangshan, China. Find exclusive deals and luxury accommodations.

hotels.title: Stylish Hyatt China City Stay in Huangshan with Indoor Pool & Onsite Restaurant
hotels.description: Experience the magic of China's ancient Anhui province with a luxurious Hyatt stay, conveniently located near the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Mount Huangshan. This is the perfect base to explore the mountain's stunning granite peaks, ancient pine trees and hot springs. After a day of exploration, retreat to the hotel's indoor pool or indulge in Anhui cuisine at the onsite restaurant. Find yourself within easy reach of the charming ancient villages of Xidi and Hongcun, both UNESCO World Heritage Sites known for their well-preserved Ming and Qing dynasty architecture. The hotel also offers easy access to the vibrant Tunxi Old Street, where you can sample local delicacies, browse traditional handicrafts and immerse yourself in the local culture.

seo.title: Hotels in Huangshan - China Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
